title: Emmerdale spoilers: The Dingles in danger of death as they are attacked
text:
The Dingle clan are never one to back away from a fight in Emmerdale, but it appears as if they’ll have an impromptu battle on their hands in the coming episodes, as they find themselves in danger when the villainous Terry arrives on their doorstep as a result of Mandy’s ( Lisa Riley) actions.

After Lydia (Karen Black) stumbles upon Mandy and Vinny (Bradley Johnson) trying to hack into her bank account, Zak (Steve Halliwell) decides to call Dingle Court, but — while everyone’s busy getting proceedings under way — Mandy and Vinny make a run for it.

However, the mother and son’s vehicle breaks down, and they’re forced to hide in the woods — but they’re soon apprehended and taken back to Dingle court.

During the proceedings, Mandy reveals the truth — that both she and Vinny were recently running a casino card counting scam in a number of establishments run by this Terry.

What with her having been honest, Mandy’s convinced that the court will rule in her favour.

However, the legal drama taking place at the Dingles is the last thing on anyone’s mind when Terry shows up — and the entire Dingle clan are left fearing for their lives as a result.

If the Dingles have proven anything over the years, it’s when the going gets tough, the tough really does get going — but will certain members of the family be able to overpower the threat?

If not, will someone else perhaps come to their rescue?
